description:
Designed to fit in smaller frames, including modern mountain bike frames with limited space, the lightweight Prism offers a firm grip on your bottle even in rough terrain. Innovative structure allows for ergonomic removal from the front or right side.

  • Carbon reinforced plastic is strong and lightweight
  • Simple and quick removal and insertion from the side
  • Compatible with all frames, ideal for sloping tubes or small sizes
  • Height is 144mm
name: Elite Prism Carbon Bottle Cage
